channel.title: public on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in public on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-16
item.description: Reddit files to take the company public (1 minute read) Reddit has started the process of going public by filing a confidential S-1 with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-05
item.description: Google Workers Publicly Launch Union (4 minute read) Google workers have publicly launched a unionization effort.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-19
item.description: Google Maps is getting a lot more detail (2 minute read) Google has applied a new color-mapping algorithmic technique to its satellite imagery to redesign the maps used in Google Maps.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-10
item.description: Google confirms new Nest smart speaker with official photo and video (1 minute read) Google has confirmed that it is working on a new Nest smart speaker.
